chapters.title: Chapter 5: The Forging of a Hammer
chapters.info: Aram, p. 174 (199)—Former Tuatha'an who gave up the Way of the Leaf to learn the sword when the Trollocs killed his mother. He learned from Tam al'Thor, Rand's father and a Blademaster, and picked it up extremely fast. He now serves as Perrin's personal bodyguard. See also Aybara, Perrin t'Bashere.
